attributes.action: Leave the European Union on 31st October, 2019 with or without a deal
attributes.additional_details: A leave date of 29th March, 2019 was set in stone and after parliament could not agree on the deal put forward by the European Union the leave date was extended to 31st October, 2019 to allow more time for discussion. For the sake of the Country and Business we must move forward and leave with or without a deal.
attributes.background: The British People voted to leave the European Union in a fair and democratic referendum therefore we must leave on the 31st October, 2019 to abide by the decision of the people
